abstract: New York City FC chief business officer Tim Pernetti will leave post after March season opener; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C. said that Tim Pernetti would leave his job as chief business officer after the expansion team’s opener on March 8.
snippet: New York City F.C. said that Tim Pernetti would leave his job as chief business officer after the expansion team’s opener on March 8.
